name: ChlamydiaTrachomatisInfectionTestsForChlamydiaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Chlamydia trachomatis Infection (Tests for Chlamydia species Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Chlamydia species nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Chlamydia species nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC SYSTEM = ^Patient; ^Donor
panel tests)
